name: Stupid Ninjas Free
description:
From the makers of Stupid Zombies!

Stupid Ninjas have infested the land and you are the villagers last hope to restore order and sanity. But use your Samurai sword wisely, you only have a few slices left before it is too late.

Features:
- 180 levels
- Simple slicing fun
- Universal App
- Supports Retina display
